body_html:
1. add this to BUILD file in contrib/lite
    cc_binary(
    name = "libtensorflowLite.so",

linkopts=["-shared", "-Wl"],
linkshared=1,

copts = tflite_copts(),
deps = [
    ":framework",
],

)

  1. bazel build //tensorflow/contrib/lite:libtensorflowLite.so --crosstool_top=//external:android/crosstool --cpu=arm64-v8a --host_crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:toolchain --cxxopt="-std=c++11"
body_text:
add this to BUILD file in contrib/lite
cc_binary(
name = "libtensorflowLite.so",

linkopts=["-shared", "-Wl"],
linkshared=1,
copts = tflite_copts(),
deps = [
    ":framework",
],

)

bazel build  //tensorflow/contrib/lite:libtensorflowLite.so --crosstool_top=//external:android/crosstool --cpu=arm64-v8a --host_crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:toolchain --cxxopt="-std=c++11"
body:
1. add this to BUILD file in contrib/lite
cc_binary(
    name = "libtensorflowLite.so",
 
linkopts=["-shared", "-Wl"],
linkshared=1,


    copts = tflite_copts(),
    deps = [
        ":framework",
    ],
)

2. bazel build  //tensorflow/contrib/lite:libtensorflowLite.so --crosstool_top=//external:android/crosstool --cpu=arm64-v8a --host_crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:toolchain --cxxopt="-std=c++11"
